sense.def: Illness Sign identical witha) se tong 澀痛 a) , roughness with pain, affecting the eyes. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 32: 治眼暴赤，熱腫痛澀方 , “Recipe to cure sudden redness of the eyes,heat swelling, and pain with roughness ”.b) se tong 澀痛 b) , roughness with pain, affecting the urinary tract. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 58: 治卒淋瀝，小便痛澀，當歸散方 , “Recipe for a powder with dang gui to cure sudden urinary dripping, and pain with roughness during urination”.
